info.title: Exact System
info.description: The System service contains the important method "current/Me", which is used to retrieve information about the current user, including the division he or she is in. This division is used in almost every other method. Other methods target global data regarding the user and account.

get.description: This end point shows info related to the accountant of the customer. If the customer is an accountant himself, the service will show the info of the customer.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An OData like filter string.
parameters.x-ms-summary: An OData like filter string.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: A comma separated string of the properties you would like returned.
parameters.x-ms-summary: A comma separated string of the properties you would like returned.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: A token allowing you to skip the first n items.
parameters.x-ms-summary: A token allowing you to skip the first n items.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Only retrieve the first n items.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Only retrieve the first n items.

parameters.name: division
parameters.description: The division
parameters.x-ms-summary: The division

get.description: Returns all (non-deleted) divisions of a single license, being the license that owns the division specified in the URI. Typically this will be the signed-in user's license, but for an accountant it can be a client's license instead. Most users will see all divisions that are in the relevant license (including divisions they do not have access rights to), but if the license is not user's (i.e. accountant in client's division), or if the user has limited rights ('view user'), then only divisions that are accessible to the user will be returned.Please note that divisions returned are only those which the user has granted permission to.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An OData like filter string.
parameters.x-ms-summary: An OData like filter string.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: A comma separated string of the properties you would like returned.
parameters.x-ms-summary: A comma separated string of the properties you would like returned.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: A token allowing you to skip the first n items.
parameters.x-ms-summary: A token allowing you to skip the first n items.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Only retrieve the first n items.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Only retrieve the first n items.

parameters.name: division
parameters.description: The division
parameters.x-ms-summary: The division

get.description: Returns only divisions that are accessible to the signed-in user, as configured in the user card under 'Companies: Access rights'. Accountants will see both their own divisions and those belonging to their clients. Please note that divisions returned are only those which the user has granted permission to.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: An OData like filter string.
parameters.x-ms-summary: An OData like filter string.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: A comma separated string of the properties you would like returned.
parameters.x-ms-summary: A comma separated string of the properties you would like returned.

parameters.name: $skiptoken
parameters.description: A token allowing you to skip the first n items.
parameters.x-ms-summary: A token allowing you to skip the first n items.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Only retrieve the first n items.
parameters.x-ms-summary: Only retrieve the first n items.

parameters.name: division
parameters.description: The division
parameters.x-ms-summary: The division

ID.title: ID
ID.description: The account ID of the accountant.

IsAccountant.title: IsAccountant
IsAccountant.description: Indicates if the customer is an accountant himself.

MenuLogoUrl.title: MenuLogoUrl
MenuLogoUrl.description: Url to retrieve the logo of the accountant.

ArchiveDate.title: ArchiveDate
ArchiveDate.description: Date on which the division is archived

BlockingStatus.title: BlockingStatus
BlockingStatus.description: Values: 0 = Not blocked, 1 = Backup/restore, 2 = Conversion busy, 3 = Conversion shadow, 4 = Conversion waiting, 5 = Copy data waiting, 6 = Copy data busy

Country.title: Country
Country.description: Country of the division. Is used for determination of legislation

Current.title: Current
Current.description: True when this division is most recently used by the API

CustomerCode.title: CustomerCode
CustomerCode.description: Owner account code of the division

CustomerName.title: CustomerName
CustomerName.description: Owner account name of the division

DivisionMoveDate.title: DivisionMoveDate
DivisionMoveDate.description: Date when the division was moved. Please resync all data when this value changes because value of Timestamp is regenerated.

Hid.title: Hid
Hid.description: Company number that is assigned by the customer

IsDossierDivision.title: IsDossierDivision
IsDossierDivision.description: True if the division is a dossier division

IsMainDivision.title: IsMainDivision
IsMainDivision.description: True if the division is the main division

IsPracticeDivision.title: IsPracticeDivision
IsPracticeDivision.description: True if the division is a practice division

OBNumber.title: OBNumber
OBNumber.description: The soletrader VAT number used for offical returns to tax authority

ShareCapital.title: ShareCapital
ShareCapital.description: the part of the capital of a company that comes from the issue of shares (France)

SiretNumber.title: SiretNumber
SiretNumber.description: An INSEE code which allows the geographic identification of the company. (France)

StartDate.title: StartDate
StartDate.description: Date on which the division becomes active

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Follow the Division Status 0 for Inactive, 1 for Active and 2 for Archived Divisions

TaxOfficeNumber.title: TaxOfficeNumber
TaxOfficeNumber.description: Number of your local tax authority (Germany)

VATNumber.title: VATNumber
VATNumber.description: The number under which the account is known at the Value Added Tax collection agency
